pkgmetadata.longdescription: # FastAPI wrapper for interactions.pyAn Extension library to add Fast API for your interactions.py bot .## Installation``pip install git+https://github.com/Damego/interactions-fastapi.git``## Examples```pythonimport interactionsfrom interactions.ext.api import setupclient = interactions.Client(...)api = setup(client)@api.route("GET", "/")async def index(): return {"status": "success"}client.start()```Server will run on ``127.0.0.1:32512`` (host and port modifiable)More examples in ``examples`` folder.
